sentences.en: ‘I don’t think you understand.’ ‘Well, perhaps not .’
"Perhaps it would be better if I withdrew altogether." — "Certainly not!"
sentences.cn: “也许，我完全退出更好吧。”——“当然不是！”

sentences.en: Andy's face paled with disappointment; perhaps with anger as well.
sentences.cn: 安迪的脸色由于失望而变得苍白，也许还掺杂着气愤。

sentences.en: Glover thinks that Smith did him down, perhaps out of envy.
sentences.cn: 格洛弗认为史密斯说他坏话，也许是出于嫉妒。

sentences.en: He was not perhaps physically the strongest in the class.
sentences.cn: 他可能不是全班身体最壮的。

sentences.en: I take it back, I think perhaps I am an extrovert.
sentences.cn: 我收回说过的话，我想也许我是外向型的人。

sentences.en: In male company, perhaps he did overstep the bounds of propriety.
sentences.cn: 在清一色男性的公司里，可能他的举止确实有失得体。

sentences.en: It won’t take so long next time, perhaps.
Perhaps he'd followed her suggestion of a stroll to the river.
sentences.cn: 也许他已经听从了她的建议去河边散步了。

sentences.en: Perhaps if you rang me when you got back to your office?
sentences.cn: 你回到办公室后给我打电话怎么样？

sentences.en: Perhaps we did acquire a somewhat fuddy-duddy image in the later years.
sentences.cn: 可能在后来的几年里我们真的让人感到有些古板。

sentences.en: Perhaps you would like to pay a visit to London.
sentences.cn: 也许，您乐意去游览一下伦敦。

sentences.en: Perhaps your force of argument might have made some difference.
sentences.cn: 或许是你的雄辩使情况发生了变化。

sentences.en: The driver was a trim young woman of perhaps thirty.
sentences.cn: 司机是个大约30岁的身材苗条的年轻女子。

sentences.en: The horrors he experienced are imprinted, perhaps indelibly, in his brain.
sentences.cn: 他经历的恐怖事件在他脑海中刻下了深深的，或许是难以磨灭的印记。

sentences.en: The lesson from all of this is perhaps a broader one.
sentences.cn: 从所有这一切中得出的教训可能具有更广泛的意义。

sentences.en: The way things are going, perhaps he won't come at all.
sentences.cn: 现在看来他是不会来了。

trans.tran_en: used to say that something may be true, but you are not sure
